name: Wrath of Loki VR Adventure
description: Become Thor, the mighty God of Thunder. Dive into a beautiful fantasy world of Scandinavian legends, gods, and artifacts. Face the raging Loki, and help to prevent Ragnarok – the mythical end of days. Feel as though you’re a part of the legend!
minimum_requirements: OS: Window 8 Processor: Intel i5-4590 equivalent or greater Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970 / AMD Radeon R9 290 or greater Storage: 4 GB available space
recommended_requirements: Memory: 8 GB RAM Storage: 4 GB available space
